headline.main: The Keys to American Pharoah's Ride to Triple Crown History
headline.print_headline: The Keys to American Pharoah's Ride to Triple Crown History

docs.snippet: American Pharoah made his own luck in winning the Belmont Stakes, ending the 37-year Triple Crown drought....
docs.lead_paragraph: American Pharoah made his own luck in winning the Belmont Stakes, ending the 37-year Triple Crown drought.

headline.main: Iraqi forces, Shia militia battle to retake Ramadi
headline.sub: Iraqi forces, Shia militia battle to retake Ramadi

docs.snippet: Iraqi soldiers and Shia militias fire on Islamic State targets east of Ramadi in the western province of Anbar.  Rough Cut (no reporter narration)...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi soldiers and Shia militias fire on Islamic State targets east of Ramadi in the western province of Anbar.  Rough Cut (no reporter narration)

headline.main: Pettersen Leads Uribe by One Shot in Ontario
headline.print_headline: Pettersen Leads Uribe by One Shot in Ontario

docs.snippet: Suzann Pettersen saved par after a deft bunker shot at the final hole to hold a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Manulife LPGA Classic in Ontario on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suzann Pettersen saved par after a deft bunker shot at the final hole to hold a one-stroke lead after the third round of the Manulife LPGA Classic in Ontario on Saturday.

headline.main: Alaska Moose, Protective of Her Calves, Injures Campers
headline.print_headline: Alaska Moose, Protective of Her Calves, Injures Campers

docs.snippet: A protective female moose with two young calves has injured at least three campers, one of them severely, within a 10-day span at Denali National Park and Preserve in Alaska, park officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A protective female moose with two young calves has injured at least three campers, one of them severely, within a 10-day span at Denali National Park and Preserve in Alaska, park officials said.

headline.main: Todt Says FIA Faces No Risk of Corruption
headline.print_headline: Todt Says FIA Faces No Risk of Corruption

docs.snippet: The International Automobile Federation (FIA) is in no danger of suffering the sort of corruption scandal currently engulfing world soccer governing body FIFA, its president Jean Todt said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Automobile Federation (FIA) is in no danger of suffering the sort of corruption scandal currently engulfing world soccer governing body FIFA, its president Jean Todt said on Saturday.

headline.main: Sinclair Saves the Day for Canada With Late Winner
headline.print_headline: Sinclair Saves the Day for Canada With Late Winner

docs.snippet: An injury time goal by Christine Sinclair from the penalty spot lifted Canada to a nail-biting 1-0 win over China on Saturday to get the Women's World Cup off to an electrifying start....
docs.lead_paragraph: An injury time goal by Christine Sinclair from the penalty spot lifted Canada to a nail-biting 1-0 win over China on Saturday to get the Women's World Cup off to an electrifying start.

headline.main: At Belmont and Beyond, Fans Celebrate American Pharoah's Win
headline.print_headline: At Belmont and Beyond, Fans Celebrate American Pharoah's Win

docs.snippet: From Belmont Park to Fenway Park and far beyond, it was a party that horse racing had been waiting to throw for 37 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: From Belmont Park to Fenway Park and far beyond, it was a party that horse racing had been waiting to throw for 37 years.

docs.snippet: Justin Rose made an early surge Saturday at the Memorial, when it seemed as though everyone except Tiger Woods was making a move. Rose kept right on going until he posted a 6-under 66 and emerged with a three-shot lead....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justin Rose made an early surge Saturday at the Memorial, when it seemed as though everyone except Tiger Woods was making a move. Rose kept right on going until he posted a 6-under 66 and emerged with a three-shot lead.

headline.main: Sinclair Gives Canada 1-0 Win Over China in World Cup Opener
headline.print_headline: Sinclair Gives Canada 1-0 Win Over China in World Cup Opener

docs.snippet: With the sellout crowd roaring, Christine Sinclair sprinted across the field and into the outstretched arms of coach John Herdman....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the sellout crowd roaring, Christine Sinclair sprinted across the field and into the outstretched arms of coach John Herdman.

headline.main: Kansas Averts Furloughs for Thousands of State Employees
headline.print_headline: Kansas Averts Furloughs for Thousands of State Employees

docs.snippet: While still unable to agree on a budget, Kansas lawmakers on Saturday averted a furlough of thousands of non-essential employees by passing a bill defining all employees as essential, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: While still unable to agree on a budget, Kansas lawmakers on Saturday averted a furlough of thousands of non-essential employees by passing a bill defining all employees as essential, officials said.
